title: Virtual Wardrobe
description: Create and manage a digital collection of personal styles, clothing, and accessories.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.desc: By clicking checkout, this set of items will be added to your wardrobe history. You can view them on the 'Histories' page.

clothes.title: No Clothes
clothes.description: You haven't added any clothes yet. Click the button below to add one.

outfits.title: No Outfits
outfits.description: You haven't added any outfits yet. Click the button below to add one.

results.title: No Results
results.description: No items found, please try different keywords.

sessionCart.title: Cart is Empty
sessionCart.description: Your cart is currently empty. Please add some items.
